sentences.en: a bundle of letters tied with pale blue ribbon
sentences.cn: 一捆用淡蓝色丝带扎好的信

sentences.en: a cradle swathed in draperies and blue ribbon
sentences.cn: 扎着打褶装饰织物和蓝色缎带的摇篮

sentences.en: a present tied with yellow ribbon
Add a length of ribbon tied in a bow.
sentences.cn: 再用一段丝带，系个蝴蝶结。

sentences.en: He even wore a necktie, a bright bit of ribbon.
sentences.cn: 他甚至还打了条领带, 那是条颜色鲜亮的丝质领带.

sentences.en: Her hair was tied up with a ribbon.
sentences.cn: 她用一条丝带系着头发.

sentences.en: I covered the scroll in sealing wax, and affixed a red ribbon.
sentences.cn: 我用封蜡将卷轴封好，并系上一根红丝带。

sentences.en: I have to change this ribbon before I write my maths paper.
sentences.cn: 我在写数学论文前,必须先换了色带. ”

sentences.en: little girls with ribbons in their hair
sentences.cn: 头发上系着丝带的小姑娘们

sentences.en: Make a Mobius strip out of a ribbon of mild steel and magnetise it.
sentences.cn: 用一根软钢条做成麦比乌斯带，将其磁化。

sentences.en: My typewriter needs a new ribbon.
sentences.cn: “我的打字机需要一条新色带了.

sentences.en: The little girl tied the ribbon in a bow.
sentences.cn: 小女孩把饰带打成个蝴蝶结.

sentences.en: The ribbon was cut and the new station was officially open.
sentences.cn: 剪彩后，新车站正式开始运营。

sentences.en: They ceremoniously cut a piece of ribbon, declaring the exhibition open.
sentences.cn: 他们郑重其事地剪彩，宣布展览开幕。

sentences.en: This ribbon matches with your dress.
sentences.cn: 这条缎带跟你的衣服很相称.

sentences.en: We decorated our car with ribbon.
sentences.cn: 我们在汽车上挂满了缎带.

words.tran_cn: 有棱纹的；有肋骨的；呈肋状的
罗纹；凸纹织物；加肋；玩笑
细长的带状鱼类之总称
装肋状物于；使起棱纹（rib的过去分词）
装肋状物于；织成罗纹；嘲笑（rib的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 蓝带程序；最高的荣誉；一流的
绿丝带，中国精神卫生标志

trans.tran_cn: 带，缎带，带状物，（打印机的）色带，（勋章等的）绶带；勋表
trans.tran_en: a narrow piece of attractive cloth that you use, for example, to tie your hair or hold things together

trans.tran_cn: 把…撕成条带；用缎带装饰
